mapper.sql: PROTOCOL_ACCOUNT_ID AS protocolAccountId, UPLOAD_TIME AS uploadTime, PROTOCOL_YEAR AS protocolYear, ACCOUNT_NAME AS accountName, SUPPLY_MODE AS supplyMode, VARIETIES AS varieties, MAIN_SALES_REGIONAL AS mainSalesRegional, AIDED_SALES_REGIONAL_ONE AS aidedSalesRegionalOne, AIDED_SALES_REGIONAL_TWO AS aidedSalesRegionalTwo, STEEL_MILLS AS steelMills, ANNUAL_AGREEMENT_VOLUME AS annualAgreementVolume
mapper.select:
select
from SYS_PROTOCOL_ACCOUNT_DETAILS where 1 = 1
and (UPLOAD_TIME between to_date(CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
and PROTOCOL_YEAR like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{protocolYear}),'%')
and STEEL_MILLS like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{steelMills}),'%')
